TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DataGridCellsPresenter extends System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl

Docs.summary: Used within the template of a to specify the location in the control's visual tree where the cells are to be added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class generates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell> instances that are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> visual tree.
